briefdescription.para: Alias template helper returning the type of a ddc::Chunk, a ddc::ChunkSpan, a VectorFieldMem or a VectorField on a MemorySpace.
Alias template helper returning the "host" version of a ddc::Chunk, a ddc::ChunkSpan, a VectorFieldMem or a VectorField.
Alias template helper returning the "device" version of a ddc::Chunk, a ddc::ChunkSpan, a VectorFieldMem or a VectorField.
